meanings.definition: The act of playing the bagpipes.
meanings.sent1: Bagpiping requires skill and practice to master.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy listening to bagpiping at cultural events.
meanings.sent3: The bagpiping at the festival made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent4: His bagpiping echoed through the hills like a call to ancient spirits.
meanings.sent5: The sound of bagpiping filled the air, transporting us to another time.

meanings.definition: The practice or skill of playing the bagpipes.
meanings.sent1: Learning bagpiping takes dedication and patience.
meanings.sent2: Bagpiping is a traditional art form in many cultures.
meanings.sent3: His bagpiping skills were so impressive, he was asked to perform at the royal banquet.
meanings.sent4: Her bagpiping expertise was unmatched, captivating all who heard her play.
meanings.sent5: The bagpiping master taught his students the secrets of the ancient instrument.

meanings.definition: The music produced by playing the bagpipes.
meanings.sent1: The haunting melodies of bagpiping filled the valley.
meanings.sent2: Bagpiping is often heard at weddings and celebrations.
meanings.sent3: The bagpiping in the parade added a unique touch to the festivities.
meanings.sent4: Her bagpiping floated through the air like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The powerful sound of bagpiping stirred emotions deep within the listeners.
